tool.name: SAGA.statistics_grid.12
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGRID False output_data_STATS $output_data_STATS name SAGA.statistics_grid.12 GRID $GRID prefer $prefer response $response outputType_STATS $OutputSection_STATS.outputType_STATS transmissionMode_STATS $OutputSection_STATS.transmissionMode_STATS

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_STATS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_STATS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...
